body:
Comment 2: 
This code is in cmd/6g:Dconv:

		case D_BRANCH:
		if(a->u.branch == nil)
			snprint(str, sizeof(str), "<nil>");
		else
			snprint(str, sizeof(str), "%d", a->u.branch->loc);

8g was missing the nil check. I've added that code to 8g, but now in both compilers all
branch targets print as "<nil>", so something is still broken.
